original_question: Focused on evolution, the studies of what man have reshaped and influenced all aspects of biology?
diverse_qns: What are the studies on evolution, which have essentially transformed and significantly impacted all areas of biology?
Can you identify the individual whose evolutionary studies have notably altered and influenced every part of biology?

Which evolutionist's studies have ended up reshaping and influencing every corner of biology?
Do you know the person whose evolutionary research has significantly transformed and influenced different aspects of biology?
Whose pioneering studies in evolution have reshaped and substantially influenced all branches of biology?
pred_ans_conf_MCQ: Humans have reshaped and influenced all aspects of biology through selective breeding, genetic engineering, and other forms of intentional and unintentional alteration of the biotic environment.I am very confident in this answer because it is a well-established fact that humans have had a profound impact on the evolution of many species, including their own. The evidence for this is overwhelming and comes from a wide range of scientific fields, including genetics, ecology, and evolutionary biology
pred_ans_conf_OE: Humans have reshaped and influenced all aspects of biology through selective breeding, genetic engineering, and other forms of intentional and unintentional intervention.
